name: Risky Steps: Deadly Zone
description:
Welcome to Risky Steps. A mix of mind bending puzzles & crazy action.

The premise  of the game is simple.

 You are an object of light that explodes if you collide with darkness. 

However, the reality is MUCH harder! ;-)

Guide the white circle through each level, avoiding the black obstacles.

Use your brain to figure out the puzzles to beat each level.

> FEATURES:

• 10 huge levels
• Insane real-time physics
• Each level with different puzzles and actions
• Possibly the HARDEST game
• Striking visuals & dubstep sound track

> HOW TO PLAY:

• Touch left side of the screen to go left
• Touch right of the screen to go right
• Touch top right of screen to pause game
• Avoid black obstacles
• Utilize white obstacles to aid your progress

Download and Enjoy!  #RiskySteps
